title: Basic Masala
description: A base I use for Chana Masala and Chicken Masala.
directions: Puree or finely chop the onion, tomatoes, garlic, and ginger.
Pour the onion mixture into a hot pan with oil.
Stir constantly on high heat until it becomes a dark thick paste. Most of the water should be boiled off.
Add the spices and mix well, but make sure it doesn't burn.
Either add chick peas or chicken.
For Chole Masala, add four cans of chick peas with extra water. Keep in mind that it will thicken as it cools.
For Chicken Masala, add two pounds of chicken and cook on low heat so that the chicken release water for about 15 minutes.
